summary: This module provides a class that encapsulates the MODFLOW‑6 constant‑head (CHD) package, managing prescribed head values (and optional solute concentrations) for selected grid cells, validating input against defined schemas, handling activation/deactivation, regridding data, and interfacing with output control and transport components.
business_intent: Offer a high‑level Python interface for defining, updating, and controlling constant‑head boundary conditions in MODFLOW‑6 groundwater models, streamlining model setup and ensuring consistent integration with flow and transport simulations.
